entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 8:26 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:26 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
